Class GameState

java.lang.Object
GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
game state shows state of game ! it is consist of plants , zombies and other stuff in the board game this class is mainly used within game panel (which also is the main class to control the game)
See Also:
Serialized Form

    java.lang.String makeClock​(int totalSecs)
    this method turn the total milliseconds that have been passed from the beginning of the game to a string that shows the clock
    void moveFreezePea()
    this method controls movement of each active freeze pea when a freeze pea reaches the zombie it will damage zombie and freeze pea will be removed when a freeze pea reached to end of panel without hitting a zombie it also will be removed!
    void movePea()
    this method controls movement of each active pea when a pea reaches the zombie it will damage zombie and the pea will be removed when a pea reached to end of panel without hitting a zombie it also will be removed!
    boolean moveZombie()
    this method is for handling general movement of zombies; first it checks if zombie had reached the end of yard , if it did , uses lawn mowers to kill zombie
    boolean planting​(int x, int y)
    this method is called whenever a planting is going to happen and plant the active brush in given location (if it is not null of course) and then sets latest usage of each card and decrease sunscore
    void setActiveBrushPlant​(Plant plant)
    this method sets active brush plant if you have enough sun score to use the card

    void setZombieProduceCounter​(int zombieProduceCounter)

    when you click at a sun it will increase total score and sun will be removed after

    • getCards

      public Card[] getCards()

    • setActiveBrushPlant

      public void setActiveBrushPlant​(Plant plant)
      this method sets active brush plant if you have enough sun score to use the card
      Parameters:
      plant - plant to be planted

    • addSun

      public void addSun​(Sun1 sun)
      Adds a sun to the list
      Parameters:
      sun - Sun to be added

    • addZombie

      public void addZombie​(Zombie z, int index)
      for adding a new zombie to list of zombies
      Parameters:
      z - new zombie to be added

    • sunClicked

      public void sunClicked​(Sun1 sun)
      when you click at a sun it will increase total score and sun will be removed after
      Parameters:
      sun - clicked sun

    • addActiveSuns

      public void addActiveSuns​(Sun1 sun1)
      add new sun to list of active suns(when a sun is produced this method is called)
      Parameters:
      sun1 - sun to be added

    • planting

      public boolean planting​(int x, int y)
      this method is called whenever a planting is going to happen and plant the active brush in given location (if it is not null of course) and then sets latest usage of each card and decrease sunscore
      Parameters:
      x - x location of planting
      y - y location of planting
      Returns:
      true if planting is done ! false if correspondent defender in not empty cell

    • movePea

      public void movePea()
      this method controls movement of each active pea when a pea reaches the zombie it will damage zombie and the pea will be removed when a pea reached to end of panel without hitting a zombie it also will be removed!

    • moveFreezePea

      public void moveFreezePea()
      this method controls movement of each active freeze pea when a freeze pea reaches the zombie it will damage zombie and freeze pea will be removed when a freeze pea reached to end of panel without hitting a zombie it also will be removed!

    • moveZombie

      public boolean moveZombie()
      this method is for handling general movement of zombies; first it checks if zombie had reached the end of yard , if it did , uses lawn mowers to kill zombie
      Returns:
      if there is no lawn mower to do this , it return false (which means game over state ) else it return true

    • cherryBomb

      public void cherryBomb​(int cherryCounter, CherryBomb cherryBomb)
      controls explosion of a planted cherry bomb using a timer when timer reaches 1000 milliseconds all the zombies in a 3*3 area around cherry bomb
      Parameters:
      cherryCounter - counter of exploding the bomb
      cherryBomb - planted cherry bomb

    • makeClock

      public java.lang.String makeClock​(int totalSecs)
      this method turn the total milliseconds that have been passed from the beginning of the game to a string that shows the clock
      Parameters:
      totalSecs - total milliseconds that have been passed from the beginning
      Returns:
      string that shows the clock
